flawed_nl_solution:
Tommy has a total of 20 x 3 = <<20*3=60>>60 kilograms of tomatoes.
Only 60 - 3 = <<60-3=61>>61 kilograms can be sold.
His earnings for the tomatoes will be $61*6=366.
Thus, his profit will be $366 - $330 = $<<366-330=36>>36.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 57, not 61. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
